title: Claiming Marcus
description: Vampires slaughtered my family.No one believed me until I met some new friends, who promised to help me get justice. But nothing prepared me for Marcus Varik.Tall, dark, and mind-numbingly sexy.But heâ€™s also shy, protective, and adorably eccentric.Oh God, I should have never agreed to betray him. Hopefully, it's not too late to fix my mistake before I lose more people I love. Claiming Marcus is the first book in an MM paranormal romance series that has vampires, betrayal, annoying brothers, music, heartbreak, hope, sexy times, and a raven named Ozzie.
author: Jocelynn Drake
